pullrequest.title: y-value of the trace in tool tip

content.raw: Didn't think of this until now \(we don't use any dds or similar with labscript. most of the stuff in our lab is mostly voltage controled oscillator based\). Might look into this at a later time. I'll try to get the non linear time pull request out first and work on the moving of markers for scaling.
